text: tae anak del yeung ban sanyea aoy ke nouv karosanyea muoy da brapei ( thansuokr) ruoch ke pitchea ttuol ban vea men noh( now thngai barlok) dauch anak del yeung ban phdal aoy ke nouv pheap sabbayrikreay nei kar rsa nowknong lokey kraoyomk now thngai barlok ke sthet knongchamnaom puok del trauv ke noam towkean nork der ryyte
